data.title: Trident Construction
data.meta_description: Trident Construction has earned the trust of owners, subcontractors and designers by working diligently, honestly and collaboratively on each and every job.
data.text:
Since 1981, Trident Construction has repeatedly earned the trust of our clients, subcontractors and design professionals by working collaboratively and diligently on every project. Our commitment to our clients is unwavering, from developing early design concepts, preparing control budgets to completing the final walk through.

Trident Construction’s core value is encompassed in our proven TEAM BUILD approach. TEAM BUILD emphasizes the collaborative value that each team member contributes to making a project successful. Today, over 95% of our work is completed using our TEAM BUILD process.

Whether your project is a small commercial office upfit or a $50 million fast-track design/build industrial manufacturing facility, our team is more than your construction company – we are your trusted partner.

OUR TEAM BUILD APPROACH

Trident Construction was founded on the core belief that our clients are best served when our team and the design professionals work collaboratively with the owner to accomplish their budget, program, and schedule requirements. This core belief and business model is now known throughout our marketplace as Trident Construction’s TEAM BUILD process. Today, the success of our TEAM BUILD approach has resulted in a 95% repeat client base.

Our teammates at Trident Construction are not only shaping the skyline of Charleston, they are shaping the future of our company. Founded on the principle that every individual adds value, Trident Construction actively hires the very best in our industry and inspires them to achieve personal and professional success. See what our employees are saying about working at Trident Construction.
